ban.description: bans one or multiple member(s) from the guild

delete_days_of_messages.description: Delete all messages of the target(s) of the last n days.

duration.description: How long do you want to get the target(s) banned?

reason.description: The target(s) is/are going to see the reason in DMs

target.description: Select the member to ban. Leave this empty to select multiple members in the nex step.

ban.selectTargetEmbedDescription: Select up to 10 members to ban. You have 60 seconds.

kick.description: kicks a member from the guild

reason.description: The target(s) is/are going to see the reason in DMs

target.description: Select the member to kick. Leave this empty to select multiple members in the nex step.

kick.selectTargetEmbedDescription: Select up to 10 members to kick. You have 60 seconds.

lock.description: Prevents everyone except administrators from writing in a channel.

channel.description: What channel do you want to lock?

reason.description: The reason for locking the channel

mute.description: Timeouts a member for a given time (min. 1min).

duration.description: For how long do you want to mute the target? (eg. 1w3d2h5min, min 1min, max. 28d)

reason.description: The target is going to see the reason in DMs.

target.description: Who do you want to mute?

mute.invalidDuration: The mute duration you provided is invalid!
mute.selectTargetEmbedDescription: Select up to 10 members to mute. You have 60 seconds.

nukechannel.description: Clears all channel messages by duplicating the channel and then deleting the original one
nukechannel.confirmEmbedDescription:
Are you sure you want to nuke {channel}?
**This action is irreversible!**

purge.description: removes a specific amount of messages

usage.usage:
<number> [channel]
It will NOT delete the number of messages specified in the "amount" parameter, but will delete them if all other parameters are met.

after_message.description: Input a message id. Only messages sent after that message get purged.

amount.description: The amount of messages to to check and maybe purge.

before_message.description: Input a message id. Only messages sent before that message get purged.

caps_percentage.description: How much CAPS must be at least in messages to purge them?

channel.description: In witch channel do you want to purge?

contains.description: Messages must contain this phrase to get purged.

does_not_contain.description: Messages must not contain this phrase to get purged.

ends_with.description: Messages must end with this phrase to get purged.

member.description: Purge only messages from that member.

not_ends_with.description: Messages must not start end this phrase to get purged.

not_starts_with.description: Messages must not start with this phrase to get purged.

starts_with.description: Messages must start with this phrase to get purged.

user_type.description: Only messages from that type of user get purged.

purge.beforeAndAfter: The `before` option cannot be used together with the `after` option!
purge.invalidNumber: This is not a valid number!
purge.noNumber: Please specify the number of messages to purge next time.
purge.noneFound: No deleteable messages matching your parameters have been found.
purge.paramsExcludeOther: One of you parameters makes another parameter impossible! (eg. `starts_with` = "a" and `not_starts_with` = "a")

unlock.description: Unlocks a channel locked with the lock command.

channel.description: What channel do you want to unlock?

reason.description: The reason for unlocking the channel

unmute.description: lifts the timeout of a member

reason.description: Why do you want to unmute the target?

target.description: Who do you want to unmute?
